item.title: Plateau runoff experiments & repo refresh
item.description:
• Benchmarked the Qinghai–Tibet Plateau rainfall-runoff dataset with a lightweight LSTM + SWAT hybrid. Achieved a 7% NSE lift after adding DEM-derived slope embeddings.
  • Added automatic GitHub repository cards on the homepage via client-side fetch, ensuring every public project stays visible.
  • Wired the science news widget to the Spaceflight News API as a placeholder feed—swap the endpoint in config/_default/params.yaml if you prefer another source.
  • Tomorrow: finish scripting daily-note archetypes and sync Mandarin translations.
